mapper.select: SELECT tbpost.id ,tbpost.deleted ,tbpost.process ,tbpost.created_at as createdAt ,tbpost.modified_at as modifiedAt ,tbpost.title ,tbpost.cate ,tbpost.img ,tbpost.content FROM tbpost WHERE tbpost.id = #{id}

SELECT tbpost.id FROM tbpost WHERE tbpost.id is not NULL AND tbpost.deleted = #{deleted} AND tbpost.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') AND tbpost.cate = #{cate} ORDER BY tbpost.created_at ORDER BY tbpost.title ASC DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{perpage}
